title: $5500-2/2.5 Aventura Luxury Condo-All Resort Amenities-Marina Palms
posting_body: ['Magnificent 2/2.5 unit on the 6th floor at the amazing Marina Palms Condo!', 'Spacious, open floor plans with high ceiling.', 'Expansive and amazing views over the marina, the bay, the Miami skyline and the ocean!', 'Imported Italian kitchen cabinetry with quartz countertop and floating bathroom vanities.', 'Freestanding soaking tub in master bathroom.', 'Large, walk in closets.', 'Infinity pool, garden and an extensive green area overlooking the boats that enter and leave the canal.', 'Enjoy sensational resort-style amenities - look up The Reserve at Marina Palms to view the list too long to post here.', 'Great location!', 'Close to the beach, to Aventura Mall, famous shops and restaurants.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE – NOT SHORT TERM.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Courtesy Related ISG RE.', 'Private owner property.']
